attributes.action: Change the National Anthem to Monty Pythons 'Always Look on the Bright Side of Life'
attributes.additional_details:
Our national anthem is absolute rubbish! The tune is dreary and the lyrics are painful. The Monarchy, and God are outdated concepts. Let's change our anthem to something british, something timeless, a true classic; Monty Pythons 'Always look on the bright side of life'

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jHPOzQzk9Qo
